mapper.select: select count(*) as total, sum(if(workState='在职', 1, 0)) as 'inwork', sum(if(workState='离职', 1, 0)) as 'leave', sum(if(sex='男', 1, 0)) as 'male', sum(if(sex='女', 1, 0)) as 'female', sum(if(wedlock='已婚', 1, 0)) as 'married', sum(if(wedlock='未婚', 1, 0)) as 'unmarried', sum(if(wedlock='离异', 1, 0)) as 'divorced', sum(if(titopDegree='博士', 1, 0)) as 'dr', sum(if(titopDegree='硕士', 1, 0)) as 'master', sum(if(titopDegree='本科', 1, 0)) as 'undergraduate', sum(if(titopDegree='大专', 1, 0)) as 'training', sum(if(titopDegree='高中', 1, 0)) as 'high', sum(if(titopDegree='初中', 1, 0)) as 'middle', sum(if(titopDegree='小学', 1, 0)) as 'Primary', sum(if(titopDegree='其他', 1, 0)) as 'other' from employee
select d.name, count(*) as value from employee e,department d where e.departmentId=d.id group by d.name
select p.name, count(*) as value from employee e,position p where e.positionId=p.id group by p.name
select j.name, count(*) as value from employee e,job_level j where e.jobLevelId=j.id group by j.name
